title: 65% Win rate in elo hell?
body:
I have a 65% win rate at the moment and just lost a game after only losing 2-3 in my last 20 odd.

yet I only get 15 lp for every win and lose 25 for ever loss.
even though i am climbing, its incredibly tedious and annoying, because i lose 2 games for ever 1 I lose.

What can i do?

replies.body:
The reason i wasn't going off the 50% overall is because i have had spikes while at 40% win rate overall where I'd get 21+ lp per win.

As I am new to league and tanked it bad when i first started, now I'm climbing and it just seemed like riot was like slow down haha.
B5 to S3 in 2 months after getting placed in B1 and tanking it early.
You are duo with a near bronze. Which mean you are vsing near bronze oppent most of the times, that is why your rating isnt spiking to your liking. Add on the fact that you are at 50% winrate.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=jebby

but you don't have a 65% winrate... you have a 50%.

Your LP gains and losses are based on your MMR which is largely determined by your total winrate. I see you recently went ona  big winstreak, which means you probably had a negative win rate before which tanked your MMR.
Also don't believe any website that claims to know your MMR, they are all guesses. Riot has never released the calculations they do to determine MMR for fear of people min/maxing the system.

You are now finally back on 50% which means as long as you keep winning your MMR should recover slightly. You need to maintain a 55% or so winrate to get "good" LP gains.

its not the amount of games you win or the winrate that matters. its who you are vsing. if you are gold 5 vsing silver 2 you wont earn as much as gold 5 vs gold 5. in terms of "what can i do" you need to become BETTER at league of legends. watch pros, youtube videos etc etc. if you become BETTER you will win vs better players and your MMR (basically the elo score you have which determines if you vs silver or gold players) will increase.
and stop playing with kaniff ,he is tanking your gains
you have silver 2 mmr,so u will gain bugger all man,u need a duo partner,cos when u lose u lose massive lp,try not to lose so much
